name: CATFINITE RUNNER
description:
In CATFINITE RUNNER you play a cat that is running away from its former life. Running, running from love. Fed up with the world the cat runs out into the dark city night.

CATFINITE RUNNER was made over a period of 24 hours.

CATFINITE RUNNER was developed by Christopher Gilbert @Motoma

Animation and Artwork by @Shepardskin and Alucard

Music and Sound Effects by Dan Knoflicek, IgnasD, and Lamoot
